name: to_lower
description: Returns a new string representing the input string converted to lower case.

params.name: str
params.description: String expression. If `null`, the function returns `null`. The input can be: - a single-valued column or expression - a multi-valued column or expression {applies_to}`ga 9.1`

examples:
